article_title: Is The Affordable Care Act A Legacy Killer?

article_metadata.author: Michael Fertik

og.description: The White House reported over the weekend that the issues hobbling the HealthCare.gov portal have been fixed. Good news to be sure but it’s too little, maybe too late – at least for our president.  Recent polls show that a majority of Americans no longer consider him trustworthy. The damage to President [...]
